trans-unit.source: Represents a control with a single piece of content of any type.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en kontroll med et enkelt ark innholdet i en annen type.

trans-unit.source: The ContentControl can contain any type of common language runtime object (such as a string or a <xref:System.DateTime> object) or a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object (such as a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>).
trans-unit.target: ContentControl kan inneholde alle typer common language runtime objektet (for eksempel en streng eller <xref:System.DateTime>objektet) eller <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>objektet (som en <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add rich content to controls such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til rikt innhold kontrollene som <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows four buttons whose <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property is set to one of the following: - A string.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser fire knapper med <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>egenskapen settes til én av følgende: – en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.DateTime>objektet.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> control that contains other <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>kontroll som inneholder andre <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: ![Four buttons](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "Four buttons") Four buttons with different types of content AContentControl has a limited default style.
trans-unit.target: ![Fire knappene](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "fire knappene") fire knappene med forskjellige typer innhold AContentControl har en begrenset standardstilen.

trans-unit.source: If you want to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil forbedre utseendet til kontrollen, kan du opprette en ny <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Data Templating oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Another typical scenario is to use the ContentControl to show more information about an item selected in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> control.
trans-unit.target: En annen typisk scenario er å bruke ContentControl til å vise mer informasjon om et element som er valgt i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Bind to a Collection and Display Information Based on Selection](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [slik: binde til samlingen og vise informasjonen basert på valget](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet egenskapene for denne kontrollen, kan angis ved kontrollens standardstilen.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap er satt av en standardstilen, kan endre egenskapen standardverdi når kontrollen vises i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardstilen er avhengig av hvilken stasjonær tema brukes når programmet kjører.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [standard WPF oppsett](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Adds a specified object as the child of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et angitt objekt som underordnede for et <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object to add.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å legge til.

trans-unit.source: Adds a specified text string to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en angitt tekststreng til en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The string to add.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som skal legge til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir innholdet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Because the Content property is of type <xref:System.Object>, there are no restrictions on what you can put in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi innholdsegenskapen er av typen <xref:System.Object>finnes det ingen begrensninger for hva du kan sette i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The Content is displayed by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, which is in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet vises av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>som er i det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> type in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in its default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>Skriv i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] har et <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>i standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> displays Content, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>viser innholdet, se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `Content` Text or a single object.
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen | ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML egenskapen Element Bruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier `Content` tekst eller ett enkelt objekt.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the control's content.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder kontrollens innhold.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en sammensatt streng som angir hvordan du formaterer det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>egenskapen Hvis det vises som en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: ContentStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: ContentStringFormat kan være en forhåndsdefinert sammensatte eller egendefinerte strengformat.

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om streng formatene [formateringstyper](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the ContentStringFormat property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>for en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, ContentStringFormat-egenskapen ignoreres.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: En sammensatt streng som angir hvordan du formaterer det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>egenskapen Hvis det vises som en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data template used to display the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir datamalen som brukes til å vise innholdet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to specify the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne egenskapen til en <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>til å angi utseendet til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information on data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om dataene maler, kan du se [Data Templating oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *resourceExtension* A markup extension that identifies how to reference the template resource, either `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *resourceExtension* filtypen markup som identifiserer slik referere mal-ressurs, enten `StaticResource` eller `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se [XAML ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: *styleResourceKey* The key that identifies the requested template selector.
trans-unit.target: *styleResourceKey* nøkkel som identifiserer velgeren forespurte malen.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen refererer til en eksisterende ressurs i <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Egenskapen element syntaksen er teknisk mulig, men anbefales ikke.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [innebygde stiler og maler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A data template.
trans-unit.target: En mal.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a template selector that enables an application writer to provide custom template-selection logic.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en mal velger som aktiverer en applikasjon writer oppgi egendefinert mal-utvalg logic.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> when you have more than one <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to apply based on the properties of each data object.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis oppretter du en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>Når du har mer enn én <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>for den samme typen objekter, og du vil angi din egen logic velge en <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>å bruke basert på egenskapene til hver dataobjektet.</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Merk at hvis du har objekter av forskjellige typer kan du angi <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do that, then there is no need to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du gjør dette, er det ikke nødvendig å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> or a data converter.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg hvis du har objekter av samme type, men med ulike egenskaper, du kan også vurdere å bruke en <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>eller et data-konverteringsprogram.</xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Data Templating oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en mal velger, oppretter du en klasse som arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>og overstyre den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element.
trans-unit.target: Etter at klassen er definert, kan du tilordne en forekomst av klassen malen velgeren egenskap av din elementet.

trans-unit.source: If both the ContentTemplateSelector and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> properties are set, then this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis både ContentTemplateSelector og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>egenskapene er angitt, og denne egenskapen ignoreres.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *ResourceExtension* A markup extension that identifies how to reference the template resource, either `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *ResourceExtension* filtypen markup som identifiserer slik referere mal-ressurs, enten `StaticResource` eller `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se [XAML ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: *TemplateSelectorKey* The key that identifies the requested template selector.
trans-unit.target: *TemplateSelectorKey* nøkkel som identifiserer velgeren forespurte malen.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen refererer til en eksisterende ressurs i <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A data template selector.
trans-unit.target: En data malen velger.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref> contains content.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref> har innhold.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property is `null`, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>egenskapen `null`, denne egenskapen returnerer `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref> has content; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref> har innhold; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.HasContent*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.HasContent*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.HasContent*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator to the content control's logical child elements.
trans-unit.target: Henter en opplisting til innhold kontrollens logiske underordnede elementer.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator.
trans-unit.target: En opplisting.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den gamle verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: The old value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*>.
trans-unit.target: Den gamle verdien av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: The new value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*>.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den gamle verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*>egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den gamle verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>egenskapen skal beholdes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: Dette `ShouldSerialize` metoden leveres fordi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>egenskapen har ikke en enkel standardverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden angir om egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien.

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: Du vanligvis starter denne metoden hvis du enten utvikler en utformer for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>eller utvikler din egen kontrollere implementert <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> property should be persisted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>egenskapen må være fast; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen eller medlemmet støtter det [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som skal legges til som et barn.

trans-unit.target: En tekststreng til å legge til objektet.
